Class PomonaTransitSystem

java.lang.Object
PomonaTransitSystem
public class PomonaTransitSystem extends Object
The PomonaTransitSystem class is the main class for database manipulation.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws ClassNotFoundException, SQLException
      Main method for the Pomona Transit System.
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - it will throw an exception if the PostgreSQL driver is not found.
      SQLException - it will throw an exception if there is an error connecting to the database.

    • newPTSConnection

      public static Connection newPTSConnection(String dbName, String username, String password) throws ClassNotFoundException, SQLException
      Connects to the database.
      Parameters:
      dbName - The name of the database to connect to.
      username - The username of the database.
      password - The password of the database.
      Returns:
      The connection object to the database.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - If the PostgreSQL driver is not found.
      SQLException - If there is an error connecting to the database.

    • createTables

      public static void createTables(Connection connection)
      Creates the tables in the database. If tables already exist, it will not create the tables again.
      Parameters:
      connection - Connection object to the database.

    • fullSchedule

      public static String fullSchedule(String startLoc, String destLoc, String date, Connection connection)
      Display the schedule of all trips on a given date, depending on start location and destination location.
      Parameters:
      startLoc - The starting location of the trip.
      destLoc - The destination location of the trip.
      date - The date of the trip.
      connection - Connection object to the database.
      Returns:
      The full schedule of the trips on the given date, start locations, and end locations.

      Gets the stops of a given TripStopInfo object
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • driverScheduleForDate

      public static String driverScheduleForDate(Driver driver, String date)
      Gets the schedule of a Driver object for a given date.
      Parameters:
      driver - The driver to get the schedule of.
      date - The date to use on the driver.
      Returns:
      The schedule of the driver for the given date.

    • addDrive

      public static void addDrive(ActualTripStopInfo actualTripStopInfo)
      Adds a drive from a ActualTripStopInfo object.
      Parameters:
      actualTripStopInfo - The actual trip stop info to add the drive to.

    • recordActualData

      public static void recordActualData(TripOffering tripOffering)
      Records the actual date of a given TripOffering object. It specifies by its key (tripNumber, date, scheduledStartTime). The actual data is stored in the ActualTripStopInfo table.
      Parameters:
      tripOffering - The trip offering to record the actual data of.
